title: doesnt this mean i should be unbanned by now?
body:
Actions that have been performed on your account are in violation of the League of Legends Terms of Use. You can review these terms at http://www.leagueoflegends.com/legal/termsofuse

Due to the severity of this violation, your League of Legends account has been banned until Fri Nov 21 15:12:56 PST 2014


If you have any questions, contact our Player Support team at https://support.leagueoflegends.com/home

Riot Games Player Support

i added the response of the support ticket below of what riot had to say
i added the response of the support ticket below of what riot had to say
i added the response of the support ticket below of what riot had to say

replies.body:
time zone.

the time on reform cards given are in riots time. in the USA, that would be PST. you have to convert that to your native time zone.
Well don't think that should really matter. It says it was supposed to be unbanned 5 years ago. Unless I'm reading something incorrectly.

> [{quoted}](name=Talon Gerrard,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ONcNNK6Q,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2019-01-13T21:23:31.241+0000)
>
> Well don't think that should really matter. It says it was supposed to be unbanned 5 years ago. Unless I'm reading something incorrectly.

Yea. Unless that's a typo I'm pretty sure it's for the year of 2014. Must be one heck of a time zone lag...
Must be Daylight Savings Time screwing it up.
No, I think it's still the time zone

> [{quoted}](name=FOR JUSTICE,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ONcNNK6Q,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2019-01-13T21:21:50.113+0000)
>
> time zone.
> 
> the time on reform cards given are in riots time. in the USA, that would be PST. you have to convert that to your native time zone.

So in USA the 21 November 2014 still hasn't passed?

Damn you guys are really far behind.
Quick tell us what goes to shit up to your time

Riot fucked up their balance.
Yasuo still exists.
Joke's on you we're not in season 9
ahh..yes i forgot there are time zones that are 5 years behind.

> [{quoted}](name=Akali Prime,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ONcNNK6Q,comment-id=00030002,timestamp=2019-01-14T16:01:31.752+0000)
>
> ahh..yes i forgot there are time zones that are 5 years behind.

bro i amended that statement 19 hours ago, and literally even said i didnt see the year.

or did you skip passed that?
Spaghetti code.

Timezones, noodle code, ect. Often it takes until the end of the day.

Just as a reminder, after a temporary ban, your account is on extremely thin ice and will get permbanned for nearly any infraction, (regardless of how funny you thought that tasteless joke was, ect)

You aren't reading the date properly

Pretty sure timezones dont lag across 5 years

> [{quoted}](name=Eternal Torment,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ONcNNK6Q,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2019-01-13T21:28:49.170+0000)

oh im just dumb, i recognize it now, iirc when it bans you for a year thats already passed, it for cheating.

that or spaghetti code as you said.
Generally Permabans are until year 3001 or something like that.

Well.. uh..

{{sticker:sg-lux-2}}

> [{quoted}](name=MagicFlyingLlama,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ONcNNK6Q,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2019-01-13T21:15:10.322+0000)

> Just as a reminder, after a temporary ban, your account is on extremely thin ice and will get permbanned for nearly any infraction, (regardless of how funny you thought that tasteless joke was, ect)

2014
Support ticket
The mistake here is that you thought PST is the timezone. In fact, it's the same as BC and AD. So it's actually year 2014 Post Sillurian Terragenocide. That's a lotta years to go.

Mumbino (Riot Games Player Support)

Jan 14, 10:23 AM PST

Hey there,

Mumbino here from Player Support.

I totally get where you're coming from, it sucks to lose an account that you cared about so much.

I'm am very sorry, but I will not be lifting the suspension due to our system detecting a 3rd party program affecting the client. We want to enforce players to not use 3rd party programs because we want to keep the integrity of the game. Upon investigating further, we feel that the ban was fairly placed.

I wish that I could go into more detail about it, but for the sake of our protection and security, I cannot. Players like to write in and figure out why they were banned and use that information to prevent getting caught again; so we try to limit that as much as possible.

I know it really sucks and I truly wish I could do more here. If you do have any more questions and/or concerns please let me know.

Mumbino
Riot Games Player Support
Vayne Mayne
"Purge with Silver."
this is what i got from riot when i asked why the account is still banned, so i guess they told me the account would be unbanned but its permabanned wrongfully, considering they wont tell me what 3rd party program it was that i was using , and dodging my questions for years on this account that was once diamond with thousands of dollars into the account with nearly all the skins in 2014 and skins you can no longer get. Ive been trying to get it unbanned for years now and riot refuses to disclose any information to me and just banned the account and refuses to give me an answer yet i still play this game to this day and they still dont want to help loyal players, great customer service. :) 5/5
ur gonna have to keep trying cause riot support is a high chance their message is automated, just keep replying hopefully a real person will respond
Riot is telling you how many years you have. You will be unbanned on that date in 2014 years.

No rioter response yet?
So I should not expect my account back in 2142? PLEASE I QUIT SMOKING FOR THIS
Umm...idk but it says you get unbanned in 2014.
That's interner explorer at its finest lol :D
Must be a 2 weeks suspension but he posted it now to make it sound it was perma ban. It was obvious.
